parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of a unit's secondary weapon (empty string if none).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[secondaryWeapon]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _secondaryWeapon = [[secondaryWeapon]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[secondaryWeapon]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"launch_NLAW_F"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]]
[[primaryWeapon]], [[handgunWeapon]], [[currentWeapon]], [[weapons]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:58</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]</dt>
<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

[[secondaryWeapon]] tells you what weapon the unit has irrespective of the status of the weapon. For example a unit that has a LAWLauncher on his back will still report a LAWLauncher as its secondary weapon. Use [[currentWeapon]] to detect the active weapon.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
